languages.text: {n}Пытаясь придать своему голосу звучности, губернатор надрывно вещает:{/n} "Прелестные дамы и благородные господа! Прятки лицемеров объявляются... завершенными!" {n}Толпа бурно рукоплещет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пытаясь придать своему голосу звучности, губернатор надрывно вещает:{/n} "Прелестные дамы и благородные господа! Прятки лицемеров объявляются... завершенными!" {n}Толпа бурно рукоплещет.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Straining to add a note of gravity to his voice, the governor proclaims:{/n} "Most radiant ladies and noble lords! I hereby declare the Impostor Hunt officially over!" {n}The crowd responds with uproarious cheers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}总督尽其所能，让他的声音听起来显得庄重。{/n}“容光焕发的女士们、先生们！我在此宣布，狩猎冒牌货的活动正式结束！”{n}听到他的话，所有人都报以热烈的欢呼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Straining to add a note of gravity to his voice, the governor proclaims:{/n} "Most radiant ladies and noble lords! I hereby declare the Impostor Hunt officially over!" {n}The crowd responds with uproarious cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}总督尽其所能，让他的声音听起来显得庄重。{/n}“容光焕发的女士们、先生们！我在此宣布，狩猎冒牌货的活动正式结束！”{n}听到他的话，所有人都报以热烈的欢呼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esforzándose por añadir un tono solemne a su voz, el gobernador proclama:{/n} «¡Ilustrísimas damas y nobles caballeros! ¡Declaro oficialmente concluida la Caza del Impostor!». {n}La muchedumbre responde prorrumpiendo en sonoros vítores.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Straining to add a note of gravity to his voice, the governor proclaims:{/n} "Most radiant ladies and noble lords! I hereby declare the Impostor Hunt officially over!" {n}The crowd responds with uproarious cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esforzándose por añadir un tono solemne a su voz, el gobernador proclama:{/n} «¡Ilustrísimas damas y nobles caballeros! ¡Declaro oficialmente concluida la Caza del Impostor!». {n}La muchedumbre responde prorrumpiendo en sonoros vítores.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vali, sesine ciddi bir ton katmaya çalışarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Pek parlak hanımefendiler ve asil lordlar! Taklitçi Avı resmen sona ermiş bulunmaktadır!" {n}Kalabalık, gürültülü tezahüratlarla karşılık veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Straining to add a note of gravity to his voice, the governor proclaims:{/n} "Most radiant ladies and noble lords! I hereby declare the Impostor Hunt officially over!" {n}The crowd responds with uproarious cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, sesine ciddi bir ton katmaya çalışarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Pek parlak hanımefendiler ve asil lordlar! Taklitçi Avı resmen sona ermiş bulunmaktadır!" {n}Kalabalık, gürültülü tezahüratlarla karşılık veriyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総督は声を強めて、宣言する。{/n}「紳士淑女のみなさん！私はここに『偽者探し』を終了することを宣言します！」{n}群衆は騒々しく反応する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Straining to add a note of gravity to his voice, the governor proclaims:{/n} "Most radiant ladies and noble lords! I hereby declare the Impostor Hunt officially over!" {n}The crowd responds with uproarious cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は声を強めて、宣言する。{/n}「紳士淑女のみなさん！私はここに『偽者探し』を終了することを宣言します！」{n}群衆は騒々しく反応する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}S'efforçant d'ajouter une note de gravité à sa voix, le gouverneur proclame :{/n} « Mes resplendissantes dames, mes nobles seigneurs ! Je déclare que la Chasse aux imposteurs est officiellement terminée ! » {n}La foule en liesse répond par des applaudissements nourris.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Straining to add a note of gravity to his voice, the governor proclaims:{/n} "Most radiant ladies and noble lords! I hereby declare the Impostor Hunt officially over!" {n}The crowd responds with uproarious cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}S'efforçant d'ajouter une note de gravité à sa voix, le gouverneur proclame :{/n} « Mes resplendissantes dames, mes nobles seigneurs ! Je déclare que la Chasse aux imposteurs est officiellement terminée ! » {n}La foule en liesse répond par des applaudissements nourris.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur müht sich, seiner Stimme mehr Würde und Gewicht zu verleihen, und verkündet:{/n}"Strahlende Damen und edle Herren! Ich erkläre die Jagd auf den Hochstapler hiermit offiziell für beendet!" {n}Die Menge bricht in lauten Jubel aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Straining to add a note of gravity to his voice, the governor proclaims:{/n} "Most radiant ladies and noble lords! I hereby declare the Impostor Hunt officially over!" {n}The crowd responds with uproarious cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur müht sich, seiner Stimme mehr Würde und Gewicht zu verleihen, und verkündet:{/n}"Strahlende Damen und edle Herren! Ich erkläre die Jagd auf den Hochstapler hiermit offiziell für beendet!" {n}Die Menge bricht in lauten Jubel aus.
